definition: To gradually reduce or diminish something, often used in the context of dismantling or breaking down a physical structure or system. It can also refer to the process of alleviating stress, tension, or negative emotions.

examples.english: I want to reduce my stress.
We need to pay off the debts.
He wants to build his muscles.

examples.german: Die Regierung will die Bürokratie abbauen.
examples.english: The government wants to reduce bureaucracy.
They need to overcome their prejudices.
